overview: Henry Wong joined Novus Ventures II from Artemis Ventures, where he oversaw the portfolio’s investments in the software and communications area. Henry’s professional experience stems from both finance and legal backgrounds, having worked for WorldCom, Morrison & Foerster, and Ellipso, Inc. Henry has experience building and exiting companies as a legal advisor, operations executive, and principal investor. He has helped raise over $200 million in corporate and venture financing for portfolio companies. Based on his expertise, he has published many papers in various legal and finance journals. He also teaches Corporate Finance at UC Berkeley Extension. He holds a JD and MBA from American University in Washington DC and currently serves on the Board of Directors for AdECN and PropertyView Solutions.
